text: The Osterman Weekend is a 1983 American suspense thriller movie directed by Sam Peckinpah in his final movie before his death in 1984 and was adapted from the 1972 novel of the same name by Robert Ludlum. It stars Rutger Hauer, John Hurt, Burt Lancaster, Craig T. Nelson, Dennis Hopper, Chris Sarandon and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1983 thriller movies Category:1980s spy movies Category:American spy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Sam Peckinpah
title: The Osterman Weekend (movie)
